EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314 - Q115.Sydney 6/18 Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Attending the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop - Sydney
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for attending the Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in Sydney. We hope our workshop gave you the opportunity to collaborate with your peers and get hands-on experience pushing an app on Pivotal Cloud Foundry.
Next Steps:
- Give us your feedback! Please take our short survey <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/3Q32Q3B> so that we can continue to make future workshops informative and relevant. - Review the workshop presentation slides available here <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/tagged/pivotal%20cloud%20platform%20roadshow>. - Visit run.pivotal.io <http://run.pivotal.io/> to try Pivotal Web Services - simply upload your files and your app just works! - Contact us <mailto:info@pivotal.io> to schedule a technical evaluation with our team. Learn what Pivotal Cloud Foundry can do for your organization.
Thank you again for joining us! We are looking forward to seeing you at the next event.
The Pivotal Team
